description:
****Course Updated May 2016****

This course teaches Swift 2 beyond the basic 2016. Chances are you're familiar with the basics of Swift 2 and are hungry to learn more.Swift 2 is a powerful language that supports building applications for iPhone and OS X. In this course, you’ll learn about Xcode 7, and learn to write short programs in Swift, which will prepare you to start learning to develop full applications for Macs and Apple’s mobile devices.

In this course, We will start from the foundations to give you a thorough understanding of the Swift language. The course will introduce Swift's types, control flow and object-orientation syntax, with a special emphasis on the features that make Swift unique. This course will also highlight some of the great new features that have come to Swift in version 2.

This Swift Course will help you quickly master the difficult concepts and your learning will be very easy.

Let's get started!
title: Swift 2 Beyond the Basic 2016
